website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for landscape equipment and comes with 2 batteries to double the performance.
pros: We love that this pack comes as a pair, extending the power twofold
Positive reviews for compatibility and ease of use
Ideal for light work around the yard
cons: Some batteries may experience short lived power

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement batteries and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these batteries to replace the HPB18 and HPB18-OPE batteries that came with my drill and hedge trimmers. My original batteries only had two prongs, but reviews said these 3-prong ones would still work. Sure enough, these fit my drill, trimmers, and charger and work perfectly. The seller (Sun Power) has also had excellent customer service. When I first received these two batteries, one of them did not work, but I understand that occasionally defects happen. When I contacted them to inquire about a return, they were apologetic and said there was no need to return. They promptly shipped out a replacement without any hassle and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: timwoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Factory-Like Battery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these batteries after I left my other 2 batteries on the bumper of my husband's truck and, yes, he drove to work and lost them. My bad. I found these and they actually work better than the 3300mah that were lost; the 3600mah keeps a steady charge going for a long time for my rechargeable stick blower for the driveway. Really great price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have the B&D cordless 18v blower NSW18 and the weed trimmer edger NST2118 the 3600 replacement batteries are a very tight fit on the blower almost to the point that the blower is going to break as you have to shove it in so hard. As for the weed trimmer edger it doe's not fit at all. For me these batteries are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: S Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write bad reviews but I bought the two pack of these batteries. I charged one and when I went to drill a hole the battery went dead before it finished. Then, I fully charged the second battery and the same thing. Neither one of these new batteries work. Sorry but these are not worth even trying to use if they were free. Until they can improve the quality don't wasted your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from buying a new saw.
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to buy a new chainsaw pole saw because my saw was so weak. I decided to try these batteries. My batteries had been wearing down for so long that I forgot how my saw used to work. New batteries made my Black & Decker pole chain saw run like new! No need for a new saw now!
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about purchasing because I saw some reviews stating the battery life was short or the batteries didn't work at all. Both batteries (I bought the pack of 2) charged right up with the old chargers. The prongs are different, but they charge and work perfectly. They gave excellent power and lasted longer than I even needed them to. My old 18 v Black & Decker tools have new life (leaf blower, weed trimmer, and shrub clippers). I got so much done. I wish I had purchased these far sooner and not fussed around.... Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be a brick
customer_reviews.text: They might as well shipped me a brick. Charged 'em for two days before using. The charger never stopped blinking on either (multiple chargers). Got fewer than 5 minutes of battery life. RETURNED. If you're looking for a $30 doorstop this might be fine. If you're looking for a B&D compatible 18v battery keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot more powerful and longer lasting than the standard battery. Awesome price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works good on 2 prong charger
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works as good as the expensive Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Fit Black & Decker Yard Tools...
customer_reviews.text: Fit correctly, securely & have more power than the originals. Good price. Seem to "hold charge" well, these are the second set ordered, to cover 3 battery charger + extra.
customer_reviews.author: ~B

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The batteries work as good as the original batteries. Same charge time and hold the charge for a good amount of time depending on the usage. I use these in a Black And Decker Weed Trimmer and I'm very happy with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin B. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer was screaming with power!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea my old batteries were so weak until I put one of these new ones on it. Now after a few months use they get 0 stars (1 is minimum). Batteries last about 5 minutes. MFG. phone number is nowhere to be found. Find they are from China and have no-one to contact in the US. Do not buy from this distributor or Forrat the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Better than original orange ones
customer_reviews.text: Higher voltage for a longer period of time than the original orange B and D 18v batteries. Worth it. They really are "upgraded." Fits the B and D tools no problem. Easier than buying Harbor Freight batteries and cutting the cells out to put in the orange cases.
customer_reviews.author: john d

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my older B&D batteries just fine
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Black & Decker leaf blower with the slide-on charger. The old batteries had two-prong charging connectors. These work perfectly, charge on the old charger and have way more power. What a great deal. I don't know how long they'll last, but they are much better than the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Kate A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is a good replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Black and Decker Fire Storm 18 V drill. It's an older one- about 2006. One of my concerns before ordering was if these batteries would properly fit the drill body. YES, they do, and they work just fine! This was a really good deal for two batteries that have more storage than the originals that you pay much more for. One tip- go ahead and get the Black and Decker Rapid charger unit ( it's ORANGE) and replace the original charger as I did. It fully charges one of these batteries in ONE hour and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: D Hermance

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as the OEM batteries with the one exception that some people mentioned which is the fit. I had to play with it a bit to get it to click in fully to my Black and Decker weed whacker. Other then that though they are great, and more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Brayshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good battery, holds a charge
customer_reviews.text: Used these to replace an old blower battery. These hold a good charge and last a while. Used one while camping for the weekend to blow off the slide out and outdoor rug (a few times).
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful batteries
customer_reviews.text: More than twice as powerful than the original batteries, and a perfect fit for the blower.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M. Lunt

customer_reviews.title: Volts for less.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power for a low price. Fit my machines just fine and provide lots of juice. Hey, two for the price of one.
customer_reviews.author: telyavelli

customer_reviews.title: perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect replacement for my worn out original batteries that would not charge. great product they work perfect and were priced affordably. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Battery not as pictured online. See my pictures of what received. My charger pictured will not fit received product.
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the picture. Battery has totally different charge hook from what is described and the charge pictured with the bought together will not fit. See my pictures of what was received as well as my charger then compare to online photos of charger and battery.
customer_reviews.author: wrlc3

customer_reviews.title: Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Two of these replaced the two NI-Cads that my drill came with, two that I could never keep charged, and didn't last very long even when charged, these two I charged once and they have been very reliable ever since.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original
customer_reviews.text: Works great and even better, longer use time than my original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Nannakay

customer_reviews.title: This is not compatible as a replacement for Battery HPB18 HPB18-OPE
customer_reviews.text: This is not compatible as a replacement battery for HPB18 HPB18-OPE. How frustrating! Now they sent me instruction sthat are not very clear at all about how to modify the batteries. Won't be making purchases from this supplier in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Dennis Schatten

customer_reviews.title: Great Batery
customer_reviews.text: The items fit well with my drill and saw and has ample power. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used these batteries in a cordless trimmer and they work great. They last quite long and seem to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Hindt

customer_reviews.title: Not for NST1118
customer_reviews.text: Description was not correct it does not fit my Weedwhacker or blower. NST1118
customer_reviews.author: LauraH

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Have used them on my drill, circular saw, hedge trimmer, flashlight, blower and Vac. All have nice power and last longer than OE on a charge. Let you know in 6mos on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Brmaz

customer_reviews.title: I bought these awhile back
customer_reviews.text: They seem to last quite some time. They even hold a pretty good charge after sitting and not being used for a long time. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Dog hurts bad

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: Better capacity with no issues. Have charged them many times thus far.
customer_reviews.author: K9COX

customer_reviews.title: Super value
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Batteries charge quickly and are ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: William J Stanczak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need to replace my old weed eater battery --black and decker compatable as advertised !
customer_reviews.author: JenSue

customer_reviews.title: Works almost 20% longer than B&D battries.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are great. Giving me more edging and weed wacking time. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Nugent

customer_reviews.title: I finished with the second batery
customer_reviews.text: These batteries lasted longer then my other battery ,when one was getting low popped in the other and finished my job.
customer_reviews.author: Kym K.

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold charge
customer_reviews.text: I used the BD 1 hr charger. When I mount of the pole saw the chain runs properly. Within 30 seconds the battery is dead. Neither batter will hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: flash

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got. What I was described and ordered. Fast shipping thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good Batteries
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are just as good as the original Black and Decker batteries. I charged them on August 28th and they're still holding a good strong charge.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Batteries for power tools
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these several years before, great price, easy to recharge
customer_reviews.author: j Myers

customer_reviews.title: No life
customer_reviews.text: Got them 9 /19 used once or twice whether put all batteries in heated shop charged him again last week and brand new batteries stone dead not charged can't do anything just throw away 35 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Product has great value
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised is great value and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in EVERY way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what i needed and VERY happy with this product...Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very poor very disappapointed will not hold a charge anylonger that my 6 year old batteries total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Paugh

customer_reviews.title: Works well with small caveat
customer_reviews.text: Battery works well 1 month after purchase. I have a B&D weedwacker with three prong ports. However, one of the prongs on the battery is slightly off and some wiggly-jiggly is required.
customer_reviews.author: LOWELL SMOGER

customer_reviews.title: 3600mAh 18v replacement battery for Black and Decker
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fantastic delivery. Batteries are still working like they should.
customer_reviews.author: charles williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great fast delivery. Used one when I got them. Was charged and worked great
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fetzer

customer_reviews.title: Iffy charger connection
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the equipment. Only issue is that it is very touchy about the connection in the charger.
customer_reviews.author: LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Good battery, but watch out for compatibility issues
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is compatible with my string trimmer, but did not like that it wasn't compatible with my cordless drill. I believe that it has to do with the third metal prong on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Walter

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit weed wacker - but was an easy return!
customer_reviews.text: The description of these batteries indicated they were compatible with a Black and Decker 18 volt weed wacker, but they did not fit. Returning these, however, was easy and problem free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long enough to remark on the longevity or life but works for what I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Anniec

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold charge well
customer_reviews.text: The charge doesn't last very long. I won't buy anymore of them.
customer_reviews.author: betty l.

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries fit perfectly and worked well in my B&D tools. However, 7 months after purchase 1 of the 2 batteries is totally DEAD. (and no warranty or recourse)
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these batteries for my cordless saw. So far they work well I used my saw to cut some decking and had no problems with performance with these batteries
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to count your prongs before you order.
customer_reviews.text: It showed as an upgrade to the original battery I have, but it didnt fit. I have two prongs not three. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I did already have a charger that fit them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and the product was exactly what I wanted. Unable to comment on longevity since I just received.
customer_reviews.author: WKopp

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if the battery fit my drill, but I was able to get it to slide in after I lined it up exactly, no wiggle room. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Home Alone

customer_reviews.title: Meets requirements for the Black and Decker drill. No issues
customer_reviews.text: Very appropriate and good value for my Black and Decker drill. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Pearce

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The batteries do not last enough to do 1/4 of my back yard. It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: We got these to replace old ones that won’t hold charge or quit working. So far these are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT AND POWER.
customer_reviews.text: Fits just fine. Quick to recharge . great power output for extended period. Much better than OEM.
customer_reviews.author: MR.FRED

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original batteries that came with the tools.
customer_reviews.text: The battery’s provide good power to my hand tools and the charge last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good value rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: These new batteries made me realize how bad I needed new batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery for use in my Black and Decker weed eater. It works very well with good power and good duration of charge.
customer_reviews.author: treefarmer 5575

customer_reviews.title: Best battery I've used
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd have had these years ago - finally, enough power to do the job. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reising

customer_reviews.title: Poor Life
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a charge for very long. It's impossible to imagine that they are 3600mAh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Art L.

customer_reviews.title: Keep your shipping boxes
customer_reviews.text: Got one defective battery but it was replaced with new ones . So far so good .
customer_reviews.author: Phillip LeCoq

customer_reviews.title: Batteries can be used on multiple products.
customer_reviews.text: This product work well. I purchased these batteries for my leaf blower and weed whacker.
customer_reviews.author: G Robert Vormwald

customer_reviews.title: One of batteries was broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the batteries was defective (wouldn't hold a charge) had to return to get a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 Stars I would. The ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 Stars I would. The item that was shipped does not even come close to the picture or to the needs of my drill and weed eater. I wish shipped completely incorrect In compatible batteries very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Donald L

customer_reviews.title: Performance worse than B&D stock battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Items received on time, they seem to be made solidly. However, even after leaving in the B&D charger overnight and the charger displaying a "solid light" for a full charge. The batteries lasted less than 2 minutes in my 18v B&D weed eater before running out of juice. The original factory batteries lasted a good 5 minutes on a single charge. Not the type of performance I was expecting for a supposedly upgraded battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good replacement
customer_reviews.text: These batteries worked fit fine and worked fine. Have only used them in limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

product_meta.title: [Upgraded to 3.6AH] HPB18 Replacement for Black and Decker 18 Volt Battery Ni-Mh Compatible with Black & Decker HPB18 HPB18-OPE 244760-00 A1718 FS18FL FSB18 Firestorm Cordless Power Tools 2 Packs
feature_bullets: 【Spec】 Brand New | Battery Type: Rechargeable Ni-MH ǀ Voltage:18 Volt ǀ Capacity: 3600mAh ǀ Watt: 64.8Wh | 2 Pack Black&Decker 18V Batteries.

【Compatibility】Replacement battery for the Black& Decker HPB18 HPB18-OPE 244760-00 90501196 0534824 Firestorm Fsx-treme FS18ID FSB18 FS18HV FS18PS FS18BX FS180BX FEB180S HPB96 A1718 A18 A18E FSB96 FS18SBX FS18FL; Fully compatible with all B&D outdoor power tools NST2118 NST2018, NST1810, NHT518, NS118, NPP2018, NPT3118, NST2118, NPT318, CCS818, CCC3000, GC818.

【Upgraded Design】 The battery capacity is upgraded 3600mAh. Compared to ordinary 2.0ah Ni-cad, the Ni-MH Cell extends 30% capacity and longer battery life.Improved performance makes your Black Decker power tools more powerful and works longer. 100% suitable for original charger.
【Super Safe】Built-in integrated chip,Safeguard features against incorrect voltage, short circuit, internal overheating,over charge and over discharge.no memory effect and improved performance.
【Premium After-sale Service】 - 30 days free exchange or money back if any product issue. 1 year Product Maintenance and 24 -hours friendly customer service.
